Worn Joy

2013-14

  1. Oh Well
  2. Some People
  3. Riding Off Into the Toxic Sunset
  4. Wind
  5. No Love
  6. Under My Skin
  7. Clean
  8. Moving the Furniture Around

Engineered by Corey Oglesby and Matt Combs, 2014
